markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magical Understudy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2896) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon evolves to cast spells. It gains the Cast a Spell activity and learns two cantrips of its tradition, which it can cast as innate spells.

<title level="2">Magical Understudy leads to...</title>
[Magical Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=2920), [Share Eidolon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2935)
name: Magical Understudy
